column1: '''Ornendil''' was the elder son of King [[Eldacar (King of Gondor)

column2: Castamir the Usurper]] besieged [[Osgiliath]]. Though [[Eldacar (King of Gondor)
column3: Eldacar]] managed to escape, Ornendil was captured, and put to death by Castamir. Eldacar managed to avenge his son's death by killing Castamir ten years later.<ref>{{App

column1: Ornendil means "Friend of the Trees" in [[Quenya]] (from ''[[orne]]'' = "tree" and ''-[[ndil]]'' = "friend, devoted to").
